entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Oak Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 a.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
